name: Dumbpress
tagline: A simple, high-configurable, lightweight blogging platform  with responsive layout based on bootstrap
body:
### Features
- Responsive design
- Themes support
- Facebook comments support
- Pinterest support
- AddThis Box
- Instagram Widget
- Facebook Like Widget
- Google Analytics Integration
- Facebook statistics
- OpenGraph support
- ColorBox lightbox

### To Do
- Plugin system
- Theme editor
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
